description:
Bounce back after an epic day hike, or bring those jelly-legs back to life after your last hill training session. Polar Joe’s nutrient rich iced matcha will help you fuel-up or refuel. Packed with grass-fed New Zealand whey protein, every serving aids in recovery. And green tea’s natural caffeine adds a kick of energy.

  • Ingredients: whey protein isolate, organic coconut sugar, non-dairy creamer (sunflower oil, corn syrup solids, sodium caseinate, mono and diglycerides, dipotassium phosphate, tricalcium phosphate, soy lecithin), green tea, and sunflower lecithan
  • 21g of whey protein helps speed up your recovery
  • Natural caffeine from green tea helps add a boost of energy
  • Designed to dissolve in cold water, no more clumps and non-stop stirring. Not for use in hot water, can be used in warm water (sub 70°)
  • Allergens: contains milk and soy
name: Polar Joe Matcha Pro-Tea Drink Mix
